title: Action Adventure Ledge Climbing Animation Pack (Blueprint)
description: This is a Blueprint Version of the Action Adventure Game Ledge Climbing Animations
longDescription:
This is an blueprint version of ClimbLedge_Anim_Pack - https://youtu.be/VKqO_1FYvu0


Preview - List of Animations -https://youtu.be/xBuNxy9wYKM https://youtu.be/rs1oucmniR8


Email - contact@motionbeats.studio


Technical Details

Features: Animations with blueprint.

Source: FBX files are included in ClimbLedge_Anim_Pack\Content\ClimbLedge_Anim_Pack\Fbx_files. Access it outside the Engine, Unreal doesn't see files.


These quality animations are all fully motion-captured and compatible with the Manny Skeleton.
technicalDetails:
Number of Animations: 102

Animation types : Root Motion

Alinged IK Hands/Legs : Yes

MotionWarping : Yes


Number of Blueprints: AN_EnableClimbMovement, AN_EnableHopAction, ArrowActor, BP_ThirdPersonCharacter, BP_ThirdPersonGameMode, ParkourABPInterface, ParkourActionVariables, ParkourComponent, ParkourFunctionLibrary ParkourInterface, ParkourStatsWidget_Interface, ReachLedgeIK


Input: Keyboard, Mouse

Network Replicated: (No)

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)

Documentation: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1UaEYxw0kvmfmj-a81JRLbyv5kw2vmCcN/edit?usp=drive_link&ouid=107048402996820646069&rtpof=true&sd=true
